Remediations.Description: Go Gold today to take advantage of exclusive Xbox discounts, special deals, and offers.
With Xbox Game Pass, you can play more great games anytime.

Affirmations.Description: with your Xbox Game Pass membership

LocalizedProperties.ProductDescription:
THINK LIKE A SNAKE! When the tranquillity of Haven Tor is interrupted by a mysterious interloper only the unlikeliest of heroes can save the day! Meet Noodle the Snake and his hyperactive best friend, Doodle the Hummingbird, who together must re-unite the missing Keystones with the magical gates that give Haven Tor its mythical power. 

A unique, physics based puzzle platform game, Snake Pass challenges players to �think like a snake� as they tackle precarious puzzles as only a snake can. Slither through long grass, coil around bamboo and climb out of trouble in the latest game from award winning independent studio Sumo Digital!

•	15 brain bending, snake charming levels
•	Master Noodle’s one-of-a-kind abilities
•	A brand-new soundtrack from fan favourite composer David Wise
•	Unlock Time Trial mode and compete to be the slickest slitherer in the world 
•	Includes the brand-new Arcade mode!
LocalizedProperties.ShortDescription: As Noodle the snake, slither, wriggle, curl, coil and climb your way to the top of Haven Tor in this one of a kind physics based, puzzle platform adventure from award winning independent studio Sumo Digital!

Features: Supports Xbox Play Anywhere: yours to play on both Xbox One and Windows 10 PC at no additional cost.
Suggested Input is Xbox One Controller, but also support Windows-Compatible keyboard/mouse. Touch Support is not enabled.

HardwareProperties.MinimumProcessor: Intel Core i5-750 2.68Ghz / AMD II x4 945 3.0Ghz or equivalent
HardwareProperties.MinimumGraphics: NVIDIA GTX 560 2GB/AMD Radeon 6870 HD 3GB or equivalent (Integrated graphics not supported)

Features: Supports Xbox Play Anywhere: yours to play on both Xbox One and Windows 10 PC at no additional cost.
Suggested Input is Xbox One Controller, but also support Windows-Compatible keyboard/mouse. Touch Support is not enabled.
